thread.title: NYFF: Todd Haynes Remembers Chantal Akerman, Talks 'Carol' Film Influences
thread.title_full: NYFF: Todd Haynes Remembers Chantal Akerman, Talks 'Carol' Film Influences

title: NYFF: Todd Haynes Remembers Chantal Akerman, Talks 'Carol' Film Influences
text:
NYFF: Todd Haynes Remembers Chantal A... NYFF: Todd Haynes Remembers Chantal Akerman, Talks 'Carol' Film Influences Next Story Prev Story 14 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
The director, who dedicated the Friday night screening of his Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara starrer to the late Belgian filmmaker, recalled what he gleaned from her work and the ways in which 'Brief Encounter' inspired and differs from his lesbian love story. Friday night, Todd Haynes told a packed audience at Lincoln Center's Alice Tully Hall that he was dedicating that evening's New York Film Festival screening of his latest movie Carol to Chantal Akerman , the Belgian filmmaker who died just a few days earlier.   Hollywood Reporter.
